name: Michael Galero
text: Convicted yung ginamit nilang term sa impeachment eh, but I guess it's not the normal use of the word that means guilty of a criminal case. I don't remember san sya originally nahuli. Akala ko hindi nagmatch sa SALN nya yung mga condo nya and other properties. But maybe that came later.    Edit: Just one of the articles of impeachment yung SALN.
